author: Staff Reporter
text:
College of Engineering Guindy (CEG) celebrated their 91st Alumni Day on Sunday.

Over 500 former students took part in the event. Karunakaran, president of the alumni association, said they would support at least 25 start-ups from the campus. The association will construct a pond inside CEG. Four former students, N. Reguraj, T.S Vijayaraghavan, former IAS officer, N.S.Srinivasan and P.V Parthasarathy, were felicitated. .
title: College of Engineering celebrates alumni day
